website_summaries.verdict: A thick and durable swim cap that is designed to keep all of your child's hair dry.
pros: This tight-fitting silicone swim cap comes in 3 sizes (medium, small, and extra-small), and you can adjust the fit by squeezing out the air at the top of the cap
Additionally, the swim cap comes with a 90-day money-back guarantee
cons: These swim caps run larger than you might think
When ordering, unless your child has big hair, go smaller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I signed my daughter up for her first swim class! And to avoid washing her hair daily and to preserve her styles I knew we would need a swim cap. Everything in the description was spot on. The cap had plenty of room for her hair, yet had a perfect seal to prevent too much water penetration! As you can see in the picture her style was still awesome after an hour swim class. Highly recommend to all swimmers with locs and braid. Will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Selby

customer_reviews.title: This is what we were waiting for :)))
customer_reviews.text: Great news. :) It was always difficult for us to find a swimming cap for our eldest daughter. She has long and thick hair. Friends gave us a Lakhtak L size swim cap. This cap worked well, but a bit too big. The size of M, this is exactly what we wanted. Also the daughter's favorite color. :))) Excellent. I will add a photo after our next visit to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls with BIG hair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 6 year old with curly, coiled, biracially kinky hair in it's natural state. This allows me to keep her hair in 2 curly afro puffs during swim class. I just slap this on, its fitted just right, not too tight, and not loose. Her HUGE puffs (straightened it's down almost to her waist) stay in and when shes done with class we just have to rinse her hair out around the edges. Life and time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hair dry large enough for long ponytails and buns
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chambly

customer_reviews.title: Great for maintaining long LOCS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in medium size in Oct 2018 for my 6 yr old. He is started taking swim lessons again March 2019. As the manufacture states, "no swim cap can keep hair 100% dry". However, this cap has kept his long locs dry. He had swim lessons on Monday and it was the first time that his hair was wet. I am not sure if he readjusted the cap in the water. I m giving this product 5 stars. Its durable, still looks brand new and keeps his hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nia M

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the size M was way too big for my 8 year old. Customer service was great and exchanged for a smaller size. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob. B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry during winter months.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it keeps my daughters hair dry while swimming. During the winter months in Chicago it can get really cold, therefore it was very important for me to find a product that would keep my daughters hair dry while swimming and in the shower to eliminate going outside with hair wet. Which could potentially lead to a cold or any other illness. I am glad I bought this swimming cap because it solved my problem at a very reasonable price. And it also protects the hair from chlorine damage a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Thick, fits her braids inside, keeps it actually dry
customer_reviews.text: It fits my four year old’s hair inside and it keeps her hair actually dry during swimming. We like this cap a lot- it’s thick too. Looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mel's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has thick curly hair and the swim cap that we used before would always slip up and we constantly had to pull it down. Now I can watch her practice her swimming in peace knowing her cap will actually stay in place. Back/bottom of hair a little damp but I will take that any day!
customer_reviews.author: VID305

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 10 and 8 years old granddaughters who have long braids.
customer_reviews.author: me myself and I

customer_reviews.title: Great cap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is ecstatic about this cap and won't take it off. She loves bright fun color( I ordered it in pink). It sits nice and comfortable and kips her long hair dry, and we don't have to wash it after each swimming session as we did before. Silicon material is very kids friendly and it doesn't pull on her hair getting it on and off. I love how this cap covers her ears and have had no more problem with getting swimmers ear. I would definitely recommend and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Juliya

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Did not do the job, not good, did not seal, water came under the cap, hair was completely wet.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hilaire

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Package received on time, it was bigger than expected, might fit an adult better. I ordered youth small for my daughter, it was loose over her forehead. Her hair still got wet. I'm giving this swim cap to my sis-in-law & hope it works better for her. As for my daughter, I ordered a different brand from another site & pleased to say it is a perfect fit & keeps her hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Ripped immediately when I tried to put it on. Sent it back the very next day. Person I was putting it on didn’t even have hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Return and refund coasts 5.99$. More chances of selecting wrong size, no proper image and description.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 yo daughter to wear to the indoor pool. Used it for the first time today and it was pointless. Her hair was drenched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Both children's hair got literally dripping wet over the time span of a 30 minute swim lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunk

customer_reviews.title: Used Cap
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if the cap fit my daughter's head because as soon as I opened I knew it had to have been previously used and someone sent it back. The cap was really dusty upon opening but I assumed that was normal if it was coming from a warehouse. I opened the cap to see how stretchy it was and all I seen was hair inside the cap, looked inside the bag it came in and even more hair. I needed a cap before Saturday but now I'm having to send this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Natashia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, defective.
customer_reviews.text: ordered a medium size and got a large size cap. Also came with a large puncture. Unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best swim cap ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said it didn’t hurt her head at all! This is a medium child size swim cap and is fabulous!! Only thing the gets wet is like the hairs that really can’t get in the cap which is like her edges and lower nape. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love this cap!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the med. size cap for my 9 year old daughter. She has very thick hair which is about bra strap length. I mainly keep her hair in scalp braids and also 2 strand twist. This cap is perfect her for. It fits over her braids and gives them just enough room. She could have possibly used a small cap however Im still glad that I got the medium so that we can keep this for a while. The cap is just the right thickness and although it does fit closely to the head its not too tight to hurt her. Great cap for those girls with breads and things!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mzcruzlife

customer_reviews.title: Omgosh, waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a child with lots of curly hair, post swimming she was just as wet as if she'd never worn one! Might work for and adult, maybe, but def won't work on a 6 year old. I purchased smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fits Over her Head
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so cover my daughters twist outs and afro. I hoped that it would also be secure while she swims. Though it holds on tightly to her hair it does let in water when she lays back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better off not even wearing a swimcap
customer_reviews.text: Of all the swimcaps i've bought, by far the worst. I understand swim caps aren't supposed to keep your hair dry, but all the ones i've used in the past, prior to this, have done a decent job keeping the "majority" of the hair dry. Both times Ive used this cap, i've taken it off to reveal completely drenched "wring out the water with your hands" kind of hair. Very disappointed. Have already thrown it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: murphytwin

customer_reviews.title: It’s made for a Talosian or Rapunzel.
customer_reviews.text: Omg it’s huge. The given measurements are correct but I have a tall 11 year old with hair to her waist. I don’t know how anyone’s kid could use this....? This cap would maybe work on rapunzel or a Talosian from Star Trek. It looks elephantine. So does it appear to be high quality? Well I guess but we all started laughing when it came out of the package. It doesn’t feel like it could be classified as a kid MEDIUM. Better order small.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found The Right Size.
customer_reviews.text: After searching high and low for just the right size swim cap, I finally found one that fit my daughter's head and covers the majority of hair. The coverage is adequate. However even with the coverage, the nape of her hair and the sides tend to still get wet. Fortunately, the cap stays in place and the majority of her hair does not get wet. (My daughter has thick, waist long hair).
customer_reviews.author: L Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Long Hair Don't Care!
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap is big enough to accommodate long hair, and still keep the water out. It is comfortable on the head, and put my fears to rest. My princess is almost nine with a head full of hair, and African American. She like most kids her age won't stay out the pool, or sprinklers or anything else involving water. You know damn well you don't get a sistas hair wet. lmao!! Especially since I'm not the one doing it. lol. It works, simply works. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LeShane L

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, Bad measuring on my part
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product but it was way too big. I’m sure measuring a head is not rocket science but my hubby and I didn’t do a very good job. Maybe the company can put out a printable template for measuring so it is a little easier? Now that we have the cap in hand we’re gonna order the correct size. My 4 yr old granddaughter has long curly hair so I can’t wait to not wash it all the time! Will update my post when we have the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Good cap
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My grand nieces’ hair only got a tiny bit wet around the ears, but the caps were a bit large for them so maybe that’s why. The girls are 3 1/2 years old and they will be able to use these for a while. The caps did the job I had bought them for so I’m happy with my purchase. An additional benefit was that their goggles were easy to slip on and off. Before, the goggles would get tangled in their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ofelia T

customer_reviews.title: Nice swim cap
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this type of swim cap before, so I was intrigued when I got it. It was for my granddaughter, but I got a size too large. However, it fits me just fine. I like the fact it covers my ears. I also like the fact it does not give me headaches! I watched a YouTube video about how to put it on and it works quite well. No wet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine May

customer_reviews.title: Gave it multiple tries, not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Agter buying a different model in a smaller size and exchanging for a larger size, we Have had this cap for about 2 mos now. It didnt work for my daughter because it kept coming and sliding off. So because it was now too large for my daughter, then i tried using it myself for swimming and it keeps sliding up. Doesnt stay on my head and therefore water obviously gets my hair wet. Not pleased after giving it multiple tries.
customer_reviews.author: SG Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cap, keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying two because the 1st one was too large. We initially bought a large (pink) and it actually fell off during swim lessons and had water in cap. Purchased a small immediately the next day thanks to Prime and it was a PERFECT fit. My daughter like to wear the cap over her ears but that is the only to keep water out
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice job! This cap does exactly what it says it will do. Chlorine is so harsh and this keeps hair completely dry and safe from it! We bought the small for our 5 year old and it fit our 7 year old as well. You have to get the air out as it says or it’ll pull off if you go underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of this at first because it had so much room at the top BUT it was a success! My son has locs and I was able to put it in a bun and put the cap on. Of course around the edges got wet But everywhere else was DRY! He went under water and everything for lessons. We ordered a small and he is 4.
customer_reviews.author: Porchia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks so silly on.
customer_reviews.text: I thought to buy this because my daughter has semi-long hair. It's obviously for someone with a ton of thick hair, all the way down to their toes, would be enough to fill up the loose space in this cap There is so much room with her hair in a bun or ponytail that she looks like she is wearing a bakers hat. I'm sorry I missed the return window or I would have sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Domhollywood

customer_reviews.title: Good for girls with braids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has fairly long braids. We have tried several swim caps, this is the first to keep her hair dry while swimming for 90 minute swim team practices. It’s kind of a Goldilocks fit - not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed kid with no bunkbed

customer_reviews.title: Great swim cap for long thick hair
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter has super long thick hair, her hair is down to her knees, so a swim cap is very necessary, as we can't wash her hair every day, in the summer she enjoys swimming, this cap has been the only cap to last, others, she might onlr get 3 time use from, however this one has lasted all summer😂
customer_reviews.author: SylviaH

customer_reviews.title: Made very well
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to give it a 5 star rating because it is made very well and is big enough to fit box braids in it. However, we ordered a medium and it was too big for my daughters head. It's stayed on but unfortunately water got in. If we would have ordered a small it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MulattoMomii

customer_reviews.title: It appears durable.
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been about a month or so but I like it. It keeps my daughter's hair contained but in order for it to stay dry, I have to use a bonnet and a headband under the swim cap, otherwise it will still get wet.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBlessedness

customer_reviews.title: Works so well on big natural hair!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year olds used these all summer long and they LOVE them! Kept their hair bone dry through all the splashing, swimming and water play. I have recommended it to my friends and other moms in the neighborhood as well.
customer_reviews.author: HappyLady

customer_reviews.title: Hair Still Gets Damp
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter has locs about halfway down her back, this swim cap has somewhat worked for protecting her hair while she swims and plays in the pool. It seems that her hair is always slightly damp, and although it's better than completely drenched.....we want to avoid contact with the chemical to her hair so we dont have to wash it and condition it every time afterwards. This cap ismt bad but we will continue searching
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Swim cap
customer_reviews.text: my daughter did not like it. It seemed too large for her head. She is seven but tiny. It fit great for her when she has her hair braided in rows with extensions but not over her natural hair. Would probably be great for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the S for my 3 year old to wear during her weekly swim lesson. She has a lot of hair and I wasn’t thrilled about the idea of washing her hair every week. It works! She’s used it three times and each time her hair is mostly dry. Even after full submerging underwater. The hair at the nape of her neck is a little wet but we can deal with that. I think I might get myself one! My only “complaint” is that the logo is pretty big. I wish it was a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: ANM85

customer_reviews.title: Not very tight
customer_reviews.text: 3 star for product but 5 star for the manufacturer for their customer satisfaction guarantee. M size is really huge for my 8 year old. Customer care is very nice and sent a small one. Unfortunately, even S size is loose and leaking water into it.
customer_reviews.author: Raghuram

customer_reviews.title: What's the point?
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great tool for the pool and swimming activities...if it worked. And maybe my Daughter has a small head, but she's got a whole lotta hair and this thing won't stay on. Seriously, what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: emeraldstar

customer_reviews.title: Soaked hair
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews & was excited about the cap. My son has a puffy afro and takes swim lessons weekly. If he is playing around in the pool his hair remains completely dry however if he goes underwater his hair gets soaked.
customer_reviews.author: dadiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick/long hair
customer_reviews.text: This cap works great for my 8 year old who has kinky curly hair that is very thick and long. So far she has used this cap for 3 weeks at swim lessons and we have not experienced any issues! We’ve tried several at this point and this cap has been the best
customer_reviews.author: endia

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cap for my granddaughter. It works well keeping her hair dry. However she says its uncomfortable when she first puts it on, so we have to keep readjusting until we find that sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob-e

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy on.
customer_reviews.text: I was ordered to my daughter but it was too big! Even Still have spaces when I wear. I have medium long straight hair . I was ordered medium size. Recommend for adults who has long hair . It’s comfortable when I put on, I m okay with little spaces in the cap, so it’s mine now.
customer_reviews.author: XIANGLAN CUI

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swim cap for my 10 year old daughter who has A LOT of hair. It a nice snug fit and lots of room on the top. The extra room is not too extra, but it’s enough to have and keep long/thick hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cap for my daughter who would spend the summer swimming everyday. She has long braids and needs something large enough to contain and protect them from the chlorine in the pool. The cap fit and worked like it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. or Mrs. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My kids feel weird in it but I think it’s great
customer_reviews.text: I think the caps are great. Good silicone material and seems to hold a good seal (haven’t tried in water yet) My daughters however feel silly wearing them because there’s a large air bubble inside where it doesn’t fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Karadsheh

customer_reviews.title: This cap is both a time
customer_reviews.text: This cap is good. Never used one of these before...It’s nice and secure. I have naturally long thick hair, and I didn't have any trouble putting on the cap, I gathered all of my hair at the top and secured it with a scrunchie and then put on the cap. Its easy to put on and does not pull my hair when I take it off. This cap is both a time!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ponych

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken heed and NOT purchase this cap. I bought 2, 1 for me-medium and my 7 y/o daughter-small and every time we wear them which is every week our entire head is SOAKED. I mean i take the cap off an water gushes out the cap. Do not buy, which I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have a lot of hair and it goes on and comes off easily on 2 year olds. They get in with dry hair and come out the same way. Love this cap.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Swim Cap Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. My daughter uses it and her hair stays almost completely dry. My daughter is mixed and her curls fit in the cap perfectly and comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Care

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more than what i expected...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. Fits my little girl's long hair just fine. Seems to be made of pretty good material.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like how difficult it was to get on. Child complained about comfort. She didn’t want to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: dolores..

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: This cap is huge, like the kid should have tons of hair to fill it. Our daughter has long. Thick hair but it was too big for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: Too big for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very big cap, keeps pulling on my daughters eyes. I had to purchase another one as she was not able to swim with this cap on.
customer_reviews.author: samuel v david

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t keep water out
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is too big? But my daughters hair still got wet. I feel like this is way too big to be a kids swim cap
customer_reviews.author: Raven Kropf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great swimming cap. I got that for my son and he is very happy with. Except covering his hair he also love that is covering his ears.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: broke first time putting it on
customer_reviews.text: this cap broke the first time putting it on. it was also too big so it wasn't like it was over stretched.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Not any less wet than others
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable and durable but does not keep hair dry or any less wet than others.
customer_reviews.author: MoniMBP

customer_reviews.title: For adults
customer_reviews.text: Got a small for my 6yr old. Way too big. But its ok i used it and got her another one from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mccalla

customer_reviews.title: An adult can comfortably fit in this kids size(medium)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great quality cap, I bought this in a medium and it fit me perfectly. Even though it’s a kids cap it’s large enough and isn’t snug.i do lap swimming at the gym. I also have the XL size for adults for when I have braided my hair with extensions. I haven’t been disappointed with the Lathak brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids. Sizing is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Not for kids. Sizing for adults. The material seems good quality. Didn't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: issi27

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased customer 😊
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, first purchase was too big for my 7 & 5 years old. I contacted seller and seller replaced 2 swimming caps and advised/ suggested the right size for me and it fit perfectly. Great customer service, thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy B

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! FIts great and helps protect her braids and keeps them dry.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Ripped the first time we tried to put it on our daughters head for swim class
customer_reviews.author: SnoRydrBoy

customer_reviews.title: Only option for long hair
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, these lasted an entire swim season unscathed
customer_reviews.author: Eric Calmese

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit big
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a medium for our 6 year old for her swim classes and it’s a little big. We’ll keep it and order a small. I gave it 4 stars because we only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: it is not tight enough around the face and falls off in the water. I could wear this as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy and use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and fits wells: not commenting on quality as I need to wait and see after couple of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Rithesh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swim caps!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two swim caps for my 7 year old twins. The caps are easy to put on, plenty of space for long hair, and the girls said they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. My 5 year old’s hair was just as wet using this cap as when I stuffed it all in a regular sized cap. I liked the softness and flexibility in getting it on, but it was not effective for keeping the water out at all.
customer_reviews.author: SAWoodard

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cap keeps my daughters hair dry while swimming. She’s 7.
customer_reviews.author: Dray

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a lot of hair and it’s easy to put on and remove. Durable. No issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: It ended up being too large.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large because my daughter has long hair, but the cap ended up being too large for my 8 year old. I have not tried to return the product for a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product; too small however, my 9 year old has long thick combination hair. I hope to return for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: shar Foster

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. Would highly recommend for kids with big hair.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for summer camp. It fits her well and keeps her hair dry as needed.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonD

customer_reviews.title: Kids Swim Cap - ✅
customer_reviews.text: The cap fits my daughter pretty good and the quality of it is good. There was enough space in it for her puff.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne M. Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: It fits my 6 yo with big hair
customer_reviews.text: Ok so at first I was skeptical if it was going to fit and hold all my daughters hair. To my surprise it does!! She is 6 and I got the small. There was no tips or tears, and the fabric wasnt thin. It stays on too! It will slightly wet the edges or your child's hair, but overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair on a cap
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even try it because as soon as i opened the package it seems the product was already used. It is hair on a cap :(
customer_reviews.author: Viktorya

customer_reviews.title: It’s SUPER BIG for my 4 yr old’s head
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has long hair and I thought this would work. However, it is SUPER big. Every time she wears it, her hair gets wet as if she doesn’t have in a swim cap. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christe Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: All three are large yet it fits their heads and mine. They are really nice caps and thick
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size, and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: I got this swim cap for my son. We are starting locs on him. The fit is ok. Should have got a smaller size, but next year it will fit perfectly. It has also helped reduce the ear infection he normally gets in the summer from swimming.
customer_reviews.author: kristal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fit just as expected. No more wet hair. My 8 year old daughter wears her hair in braids and I couldn’t find a cap big enough to cover her entire head so her hair would always be soaking wet. Not anymore . I highly recommend this swim cap. I purchased a size medium for her and it fits over her hair which is braided up into a bun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Bought for my 6 year old who has a ton of thick curly hair. It’s a little big on top but seals to her head great.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Your hair will be soaking wet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand of swim cap 1 for me and my daughter. While I like the material the swim cap does nothing to keep our hair dry. You can see the water under the swim cap when it's on our head. When we remove the swim cap our hair is soaking wet. I will be returning these to the company for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nekeva Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Love It!! Hair stayed dry!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Swim cap ever! I bought this for my daughter but it fits me perfectly- size small. I swam for about 2 hours and my hair was completely dry afterwards! I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer JOY Allen

customer_reviews.title: love this  swim cap
customer_reviews.text: tried many and i have to say this is the best!keeps my sons dreads water free!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, nice color, easy to put on my daughter's head but doesn't keep the hair dry. If I could, I would return it,but it's too late. We only used it once for her swimming lesson and all of her long hair was completely wet.
customer_reviews.author: Shonuff

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 5yr old kid
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 5yr old son. but this does't fit, its too big for his head.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: the exactly swim cap size
customer_reviews.text: I like the swim cap the problem is that I don't know exactly what size is my kid when I buy size M is to short or size L to big she has long hair can you please help to buy the good size for her? Thank you very much for your help BR
customer_reviews.author: beatriz rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as she has a LOT of hair. It works pretty well for the most part. Every once in a while it slips off, but that is partially because she puts it on kind of sloppily (she's 8).
customer_reviews.author: ChristyN

customer_reviews.title: Thick and stretchable material with plenty of room for hair
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much room this cap gives for the hair! The material looks very durable, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Fits over braids and beads
customer_reviews.text: It works for African American girl w braids and beads
customer_reviews.author: Monique Cowell

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the comfort of this cap and the sturdiness. Unfortunately, it does allow water to seep in and reach her hair, no matter how low we put it or how high. Her hair fits but her hair gets wet worse than other caps we used.
customer_reviews.author: Tennille Finks

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: A little to big for my daughters head, we were able to wrap her hair in a Towel and then place the shower cap on. Other wise it would slip off
customer_reviews.author: shantina k.

product_meta.title: Swim Caps for Long Hair Kids - Swimming Cap for Girls Boys Kids Teens with Long Curly Hair Braids Dreadlocks - 100% Silicone Hypoallergenic Waterproof Swim Hat
product_meta.description:
The only swim caps for long hair that don’t intend to clench your head!


Your kid got long hair, braids or dreadlocks? It takes time and effort to look after it. Swim classes, pool therapy, or just swimming scare your girl or boy?

You know what a pain it is to dry your daughter's hair afterward when it’s partially or totally wet, then comb her hair, style her hair, and so on.

Every single ordinary pool cap (without exception) is designed to press against your child's head. Check out any high-brand swimming cap for kids. Just look at it and imagine how it would work when placed on the head. The more hair your junior has – the harder the pressure on their head.

What is the solution we offer you? Imagine a swim cap for braids and dreadlocks that doesn’t push, press, or clench your head.

Our Lahtak Extra Large Swim Cap is a bestseller among swimming caps for long hair. It has proven its efficiency for thousands of happy customers. Now its high quality is expanded to the kids and teens with the new Kids Edition Lahtak Long Hair Swim Cap.

This LOOSEFIT DESIGN is based on an unparalleled principle – we divide the functions. One part of the cap FITS the head, while the other part leaves hair LOOSE. It doesn’t touch the head – so it doesn’t press against it.

Imagine a headband and the way you put it on. That’s the feeling your child will have with our Swim Cap for Kids.

It's made from the tough silicone material, which is stretchable, durable, soft, and comfortable (unlike Lycra), and it will last for a long period of time. 

A wonderful gift for your child, your friend’s kid, or your niece who is fond of going swimming, indoors or out.



Click "Add to Cart" to start enjoying swimming NOW!
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE SWIM CAP by Lahtak (L & XL) is probably the best swimming cap for long hair available
SWIM CAP KIDS LONG HAIR are smaller sizes: M - for youth, S - kids swim cap, XS - toddler swim hat
CHILDRENS SWIM CAP is suitable for LONG HAIR, DREADLOCKS, AFRO, WEAVES, HAIR EXTENSIONS, BRAIDS.
SWIM CAPS THAT KEEP HAIR DRY 100% don’t exist. Our silicone swim cap helps to achieve it 99.9%
QUALITY leads to 90-DAY GUARANTEE. If you don’t like your swim hat, we’ll refund your money
